ygData.subject: Re: Eye of confusion
ygData.msgSnippet: Taunt spell = Any spell that seems to make a mob really really pissed at you.  ie most enchanter spells. ... From: Wanderer CommonWealth
ygData.messageBody:
Taunt spell = Any spell that seems to make a mob really really pissed at
you. ie most enchanter spells.


-----Original Message-----
From: Wanderer CommonWealth [mailto:wanderercw@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 5:03 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Eye of confusion


From: Wanderer CommonWealth <wanderercw@...>

what? that didn't seem clear, Taunt spell?

--- "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...> wrote:
> From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>
>
> Okay, basically it blinds the target.
>
> this is deadly in Pvp. try it on yourself and see.
>
> Against a mob, its worthless if your in melee with
> it. However, what
> you can do is with your pet, cast this while in
> melee, and follow it
> with some mega taunt spell. When the target comes
> after you, it will be
> confused, and unable to find you. If you dont cast
> a taunt spell, it
> will happily bash on your pet.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: WeinisFROG@... [mailto:WeinisFROG@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 3:05 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Eye of confusion
>
>
> From: WeinisFROG@...
>
> it is like fear only they run in all directions and
> for alonger period
> of time
>
>
